quoteText: If any part of this Agreement is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion of the Agreement will be construed to reflect the partiesâ€™ original intent. The remaining portions will remain in full force and effect.
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
